uptime.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the period of time when a computer is working normally and is able to be used
uptime.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Some customers need 99% or better uptime from their mainframe computers.
uptime.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the period of time when a computer is working normally and able to be used
uptime.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Our service is an integral part in enhancing productivity and ensuring constant uptime.
